thread.title: A 5 stars at the right place..
thread.title_full: A 5 stars at the right place.. - Review of The Pelham, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: FUNDEV
title: A 5 stars at the right place..
text:
Excellent connection point for a city-break in London - nearby South Ken tube station to Heathrow and all major points in Central London - good bedrooms and bathrooms, good breakfast, italian style management, very kind personnel - clean and well decorated hotel, good value for money
Room Tip: try to make a deal on an Executive - a bit more spacious See more room tips
